item.title: Making maps in Python
item.description: In my NZ project, I decided to plot my results entirely in Python to keep the pipeline simple. Turned out if you can fix the projection, you are half-way there.

item.title: OpenQuake
item.description: OpenQuake is a Python package created by the Global Earthquake Model foundation (GEM) for producing [[notes/PSHA|PSHA]] models. Structures hazardlib risklib github repository Website

item.title: Pandas
item.description: I am unable to leave pandas because I work with catalogs. But I hear good things about xarray Row iteration iterrow 1 2 for i, row in df.
